Building a Simon game

25 Feb 2017 After finishing the Tic Tac Toe game, I set out to finish the last Front End project from Free Code Camp, a Simon Game. The game consists of 4 buttons, from which a sequence will play. The player’s job is to match that sequence. If you do, the sequence grows, otherwise it plays the same sequence until you pass the current level. Straight forward rules, but I really had no clue how to implement... [Read More]
